name: be-iqx

scripts.collect-technical: curl -X POST http://localhost:5001/api/technical/collect -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d "{\"tickers\": $(cat tickers.json | tr -d '\n'), \"useWorkers\": true, \"workerCount\": 128}"
scripts.collect-technical-hour: curl -X POST http://localhost:5001/api/technical/collect -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d "{\"tickers\": $(cat tickers.json | tr -d '\n'), \"timeFrame\": \"ONE_HOUR\", \"useWorkers\": true, \"workerCount\": 128}"
scripts.collect-technical-day: curl -X POST http://localhost:5001/api/technical/collect -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d "{\"tickers\": $(cat tickers.json | tr -d '\n'), \"timeFrame\": \"ONE_DAY\", \"useWorkers\": true, \"workerCount\": 128}"
scripts.collect-technical-week: curl -X POST http://localhost:5001/api/technical/collect -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d "{\"tickers\": $(cat tickers.json | tr -d '\n'), \"timeFrame\": \"ONE_WEEK\", \"useWorkers\": true, \"workerCount\": 128}"
scripts.test-search-examples: echo 'Testing search examples...' && curl 'http://localhost:5001/api/tickers/search?query=FPT&limit=5' && echo '' && curl 'http://localhost:5001/api/tickers/search?query=VN&limit=5' && echo '' && curl 'http://localhost:5001/api/tickers/search?query=Petro&limit=5'

description: Professional Node.js application for collecting stock ticker data from Simplize API
